text: The Most Honourable Order of Seri Paduka Mahkota Brunei (), also translated as The Most Honourable Order of the Crown of Brunei, is an order of Brunei. It was established on 1 March 1954 by Sultan Omar Ali Saifuddien III. The order consists of three classes: {| class="wikitable" !Class !Post-nominal !Title |- |First Class |SPMB |Dato Seri Paduka |- |Second Class |DPMB |Dato Paduka |- |Third Class |SMB | - |} == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1954 Category:1954 establishments in Brunei
title: Order of Seri Paduka Mahkota Brunei
